text: Regular verb-এর V2 এবং V3 form সাধারণত -ed যোগ করে তৈরি হয়।
description:
### Structure
V1 + ed → V2, V3
### Examples
- play → played → played
- work → worked → worked
- watch → watched → watched

text: Regular verb যদি e দিয়ে শেষ হয় তবে শুধু d যোগ হয়।
description:
### Structure
V1 (end with 'e') + d → V2, V3
### Examples
- live → lived → lived
- love → loved → loved

text: Regular verb যদি ব্যঞ্জনবর্ণ + y দিয়ে শেষ হয় তবে y → ied হবে।
description:
### Structure
V1 (consonant + y) → y → ied
### Examples
- cry → cried → cried
- study → studied → studied

text: Irregular verb-গুলোর V2 এবং V3 form মুখস্থ করতে হয়।
description:
### Examples
- go → went → gone
- eat → ate → eaten
- write → wrote → written

text: Subject he/she/it/singular noun হলে Verb-এর সাথে সাধারণত s/es যোগ হয়।
description:
### Structure
Subject (he/she/it) + V1 + s/es
### Examples
- He works
- She goes
- It rains

text: Verb যদি o, ch, sh, ss, x দিয়ে শেষ হয় তাহলে es যোগ হয়।
description:
### Structure
V1 (end with o/ch/sh/ss/x) + es
### Examples
- go → goes
- watch → watches
- pass → passes

text: Verb যদি vowel + y দিয়ে শেষ হয়, তাহলে শুধু s যোগ হবে।
description:
### Examples
- play → plays
- enjoy → enjoys

text: Continuous Tense-এ সর্বদা verb-এর সাথে ing যোগ হয়।
description:
### Structure
V1 + ing
### Examples
- go → going
- write → writing
- run → running

text: Verb যদি এক অক্ষরবিশিষ্ট হয় এবং শেষে ব্যঞ্জনবর্ণ থাকে, ing যোগ করার আগে consonant ডাবল হয়।
description:
### Examples
- run → running
- sit → sitting
- cut → cutting

text: Verb e দিয়ে শেষ হলে ing যোগ করার সময় e বাদ পড়ে।
description:
### Examples
- write → writing
- drive → driving
- give → giving

text: Past Perfect-এ verb-এর সর্বদা V3 form হয়।
description:
### Structure
had + V3
### Examples
- had gone
- had eaten

text: Present Perfect-এ verb-এর সর্বদা V3 form হয়।
description:
### Structure
have/has + V3
### Examples
- has seen
- have written

text: Future Perfect-এ verb-এর সর্বদা V3 form হয়।
description:
### Structure
will have + V3
### Examples
- will have finished
- will have gone

text: Passive Voice-এ verb সর্বদা V3 form হয়।
description:
### Structure
be + V3
### Examples
- is written
- was done

text: Modal verb-এর পরে verb-এর base form (V1) হয়।
description:
### Examples
- can go
- should read
- will come

text: To-এর পরে সাধারণত verb-এর base form (V1) হয়।
description:
### Examples
- to read
- to go

text: Gerund-এ verb-এর সাথে ing যোগ হয় এবং এটি noun-এর মতো কাজ করে।
description:
### Examples
- Reading is fun.
- Swimming is healthy.

text: Infinitive-এর গঠন হচ্ছে to + V1।
description:
### Examples
- to run
- to speak

text: Verb-এর plural subject হলে verb base form থাকে।
description:
### Examples
- They play
- We read

text: Some verbs do not take ing form (Non-progressive verbs)।
description:
### Examples
- know, understand, believe
(এগুলো সাধারণত ing নেয় না)

text: “fond of / interested in / capable of / good at / without / before / after”—এর পরে সবসময় Gerund (V + ing) হয়।
description:
### Structure
(preposition/phrase) + V + ing

### Examples
- He is fond of playing football.
- She is interested in learning English.
- They left without saying goodbye.
- Before going home, I visited him.
- I am good at solving puzzles.
- He succeeded without trying hard.
- After finishing his work, he went home.
- She is capable of managing the team.
- We talked about going to the park.
- They were excited about travelling abroad.

examples.sentence: After __ (finish) his work, he went home.
She is capable of __ (manage) the team.
We talked about __ (go) to the park.
